items.description: A bus carrying a junior high football team to a game crashed Saturday north of Pittsburgh, sending 21 of the 28 people on board to the hospital

items.title: Texas Gov. Abbott vows to approve GOP-leaning congressional voting map
items.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott has promised to sign a new congressional voting map designed to help Republicans maintain their slim majority in Congress

items.title: Beaches reopen in New York and North Carolina after Hurricane Erin
items.description: New York and North Carolina have begun reopening beaches that had been closed due to Hurricane Erin
